hadiths.text: Ubayy said (referring to the hadith above), "We considered this as a saying from the Qur'an till the Surah (beginning with):"The mutual rivalry (for piling up of worldly things) diverts you' (102:1) was revealed

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُتَّقَى مِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَالِ
chapter.eng-name: The Fitnah of wealth should be warded off
